humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The pathology report does not provide information on the lymph nodes or metastases, only describing the carcinoma in the left breast. Therefore, based on the given rules, the N stage would be N0, as per New Rule 11: N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The pathology report does not mention any involvement of regional lymph nodes. The report only mentions the presence of an infiltrating lobular carcinoma in the left breast, with no evidence of necrosis and 100% viability. Therefore, the N stage for this patient would be N0 (no regional lymph node involvement).
